skills.title: Networking
skills.description: Configure and manage Router and Switch, Subnetting Concepts, OSI model, TCP/IP protocols, Routing protocal (OSPF, BGP, RIP, IS-IS), Switching protocol (STP,RSTP,VLAN,LACP)

skills.title: Linux Server
skills.description: User management, Process management, Storage management, LVM Concepts, Security concepts like firewall and selinux, performance monitoring, Permissions, samba, Shell Scripting

skills.title: Windows Server
skills.description: Active Directory, Domain Controller, Group Policy management, DHCP configuration, DNS configure and management, Role and Policy Management

skills.title: Amazon Web Services
skills.description: Familiar in services like, EC2(Instances,ELB,Autoscaling,EBS), RDS, Lambda, VPC, IAM, Route53, Cloudwatch, CloudTrail, Cloud Front, EventBridge, AWS SNS

skills.description: Familiar in services like, EC2(Instances,ELB,Autoscaling,EBS), RDS, Lambda, VPC, IAM, Route53, Cloudwatch, CloudTrail, Cloud Front, EventBridge, AWS SNS
